subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Kris Draper, Darren Helm and Patrick Eaves drew praise for their play in a first-round sweep of Phoenix in the N.H.L. playoffs.
snippet: Detroit’s Kris Draper, Darren Helm and Patrick Eaves drew praise for their play in a first-round sweep of Phoenix in the N.H.L. playoffs.
